log

public void log(String componentType,
                Object toBeLogged,
                int level,
                Properties additionals)
Description copied from interface: ISysLog
This defines a method for logging that must be supported to be registered at CSysLog. The Systema Components are using CSysLog for logging.

Specified by:
log in interface ISysLog
Parameters:
componentType - The name of the application part that called the log method.
This is used for the component log levels!
(May be empty if the concret implementation does not need this information.)
toBeLogged - The object that has to be logged.
level - The level that is used for logging the given text.
(May be empty if the concret implementation does not need this information.)
additionals - Additional parameters for checking and/or formatting this log entry.
(May be empty if the concret implementation does not support additional information.)

getPropertyInfo in interface ISysComponent
